    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.account 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Account
      An Account is a unique identity within a Directory.
      interface  AccountList
      A CollectionResource containing Account instances.
      interface  EmailVerificationToken 
      interface  PasswordResetToken 

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.accountStoreMapping

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.accountStoreMapping 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccountStoreMapping<T extends AccountStoreHolder>
      An AccountStoreMapping represents the assignment of an AccountStore (either a Group, Organization or Directory) to an Application or an Organization.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.api

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ApiAuthenticationResult
      An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) using an ApiKey.
      interface  ApiKey
      An ApiKey is a secure random username/password pair (called an id and secret) attributed to an Account that can be used by the account to make secure requests to an API service.
      interface  ApiKeyList
      A CollectionResource containing ApiKey instances.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.application 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Application
      An Application instance represents a Stormpath registered application.
      interface  ApplicationAccountStoreMapping
      An ApplicationAccountStoreMapping represents the assignment of an AccountStore (either a Group, Organization or Directory) to an Application.
      interface  ApplicationAccountStoreMappingList
      A CollectionResource containing ApplicationAccountStoreMapping instances.
      interface  ApplicationList
      A CollectionResource containing Application instances.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.authc

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.authc 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AuthenticationResult
      An AuthenticationResult represents the return value of an Application authentiation attempt.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.cache

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.cache with type parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Resource>
      CacheConfigurationBuilder      		 Caches.forResource(Class<T> clazz)
      Returns a new CacheConfigurationBuilder to configure a cache region that will store data for instances of type clazz.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.directory 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccountCreationPolicy
      A AccountCreationPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects and actions relevant to the Account-creation process.
      interface  AccountStore 
      interface  CustomData
      A CustomData is a Map resource within an Account or a Group, that allows you to specify whatever name/value pairs you wish.
      interface  Directory
      A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.
      interface  DirectoryList
      A CollectionResource containing Directory instances.
      interface  PasswordPolicy
      A PasswordPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the restrictions on passwords for accounts associated with the parent Directory.
      interface  PasswordStrength
      PasswordStrength is the resource used to configure the password strength policy.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.ds

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.ds with type parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Resource>
      T      		 DataStore.getResource(String href, Class<T> clazz)
      Looks up (retrieves) the resource at the specified href URL and returns the resource as an instance of the specified class.
      <T extends Resource,O extends Options>
      T      		 DataStore.getResource(String href, Class<T> clazz, O options)
      Retrieves the resource at the specified href according to the specified Options and returns the resource as an instance of the specified clazz.
      <T extends Resource>
      T      		 DataStore.instantiate(Class<T> clazz)
      Instantiates and returns a new instance of the specified Resource type.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      A group is a uniquely-named collection of Accounts within a Directory.

      A CollectionResource containing Group instances.
      interface  GroupMembership
      A GroupMembership represents the association of an Account and a Group.
      interface  GroupMembershipList
      A CollectionResource containing GroupMembership instances.

      A cryptographic nonce representation for values that cannot be used more than once.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.mail

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.mail 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EmailTemplate<T extends EmailTemplate>
      This resource provides operations to customize all the internal components (e.g.
      interface  ModeledEmailTemplate
      The ModeledEmailTemplate is a EmailTemplate resource which also provides the ability to configure the url where the user will be redirected once he clicks on the link received in the Email.
      interface  ModeledEmailTemplateList
      A CollectionResource containing ModeledEmailTemplate instances.
      interface  UnmodeledEmailTemplate
      The UnmodeledEmailTemplate is an EmailTemplate resource that will be sent to the user after the newly-created account has been successfully verified.
      interface  UnmodeledEmailTemplateList
      A CollectionResource containing UnmodeledEmailTemplate instances.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccessToken
      This class represents an Authentication OAuth2 token created in Stormpath.
      interface  AccessTokenList
      A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
      interface  AccessTokenResult
      An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API specifically for the purpose of obtaining a new OAuth Access Token (eg via a OAuth 2 Client Credentials Grant Type request).
      interface  GrantAuthenticationToken
      A GrantAuthenticationToken instance reflects the result of executing an Authentication Request to create or refresh an AccessToken.
      interface  OauthAuthenticationResult
      An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) via OAuth 2.
      interface  OauthPolicy
      An OauthPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the OAuth tokens associated with an Application
      interface  RefreshToken
      This interfaces denotes a specific kind of AccessToken: a Refresh Token.
      interface  RefreshTokenList
      A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      An OrganizationAccountStoreMapping represents the assignment of an AccountStore (either a Group or Directory) to a Organization.

      A Facebook-specific Provider Resource.

      Facebook-specific ProviderData Resource.

      Google-specific Provider Resource.

      Google-specific ProviderData Resource.
      interface  LinkedInProvider
      A LinkedIn-specific Provider Resource.
      interface  LinkedInProviderData
      LinkedIn-specific ProviderData Resource.
      interface  Provider
      A provider resource holds specific information needed to work with Provider-based Directories (e.g, Google and Facebook).
      interface  ProviderAccountResult
      Represents the result of the attempt to access the Provider's account.
      interface  ProviderData
      Resource containing Provider-specific data for the Account.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.resource

      Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.resource with type parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CollectionResource<T extends Resource>
      A CollectionResource is a first-class Resource that has its own properties (such as offset and limit, but also contains other Resource instances.
      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.resource 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CollectionResource<T extends Resource>
      A CollectionResource is a first-class Resource that has its own properties (such as offset and limit, but also contains other Resource instances.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.filter.oauth

      Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.filter.oauth that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PasswordGrantAccessTokenResult
      An OAuth AccessTokenResult that is returned as a result from a successful password grant_type authentication attempt.

    • Uses of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant

      Subinterfaces of Resource in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Tenant
      A Tenant represents a customer's private data 'space' within Stormpath that contains all of the customer's Stormpath-stored resources, like Applications, Directories, Accounts and Groups.
